data.name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Power Rage™
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the realm where speed reigns supreme. One of Vert Wheeler's most wanted cars can finally be yours!

From the acclaimed animated series AcceleRacers, Power Rage™, the car that replaced Deora II™ when it was destroyed, will take you at full speed to the realm... of victories! Featuring neon lights to race even in the dark with unmistakable style, and a huge rear wing to keep you glued to the track while still ready to fly across the finish line.

Unleash the fury of 410 horsepower and tame this racing beast! Add Power Rage™ to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

data.short_description: Welcome to the realm where speed reigns supreme. From the acclaimed animated series AceeleRacers, it's Vert Wheeler's car Power Rage™! Unleash its fury and tame this racing beast! Add it to your collection now!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
